channel.title: Comments on: How to use the name picker

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@28 - there is no database to download. You just need to look at the source of the demo HTML page for the javascript.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@28 – there is no database to download. You just need to look at the source of the demo HTML page for the javascript.

Matt

item.title: By: Menchie
item.dc:creator: Menchie
item.description: <p>First of all this is a brilliant code.<br/><br /><br/><br />Is it suppose to prompt you to login? I am using this for another application and I am already authenticated. When I click the pop-up button, it asks me to login again? what should be the ACL setting for the names.nsf to avoid the prompt?</p>
item.content:encoded:
First of all this is a brilliant code.

Is it suppose to prompt you to login? I am using this for another application and I am already authenticated. When I click the pop-up button, it asks me to login again? what should be the ACL setting for the names.nsf to avoid the prompt?

item.title: By: Rod Weaver
item.dc:creator: Rod Weaver
item.description: <p>Matt, I've downloaded the db and want to use the "Type Ahead" format in an app I am developing. In addition to picking a name, how can I use this to populate other fields from the NAB entry (Phone, address etc) once I select the name.<br /><br />ie - Say I have a form with a Name field and a Phone field. When I select the Name via Name Picker I also want it to populate the Phone field.<br /><br />Thanks.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt, I’ve downloaded the db and want to use the “Type Ahead” format in an app I am developing. In addition to picking a name, how can I use this to populate other fields from the NAB entry (Phone, address etc) once I select the name.

ie – Say I have a form with a Name field and a Phone field. When I select the Name via Name Picker I also want it to populate the Phone field.

Thanks.

item.title: By: kipa
item.dc:creator: kipa
item.description: <p>when create new document multivaluepicker works fine, but after saving it not works anymore. <br />It show next error in popup window: ERROR 500, Http Web Server: Invalid URL Exception. <br /></p>
item.content:encoded: when create new document multivaluepicker works fine, but after saving it not works anymore. <br />It show next error in popup window: ERROR 500, Http Web Server: Invalid URL Exception. <br />

item.title: By: kipa
item.dc:creator: kipa
item.description: <p>when create new document multivaluepicker works fine, but after saving it not works anymore. <br />It show next error in popup window: ERROR 500, Http Web Server: Invalid URL Exception. <br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
when create new document multivaluepicker works fine, but after saving it not works anymore.
It show next error in popup window: ERROR 500, Http Web Server: Invalid URL Exception.

item.title: By: Marcus Laubli

item.description: <p>Matt,<br/><br/>Where in Ipswich? My wife's family lives there. It sure is a small world! <br/><br/><br/><br/>Marcus<br/><br/><br/><br/>P.S. I think your picker is the pick of the crop! <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif"</a>> I love it!<img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJG/$FILE/cheesy.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt,

Where in Ipswich? My wife’s family lives there. It sure is a small world!

Marcus

P.S. I think your picker is the pick of the crop! http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif“> I love it!http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJG/$FILE/cheesy.gif“>

item.title: By: fernando ferrandini
item.dc:creator: fernando ferrandini
item.description: <p>hey Matt,</p><p>why i cant access other server´s names.nsf? why only the server the APP is running?</p><p>Im asking that , cause sometimes we do search others server´s names.nsf in NAB, you choose the server you want to search for... from a combo or whatever..</p><p>Do you have any reference on Domino Assistance+AJAX?<br/>how could i proceed to make it possible?</p><p>how to retrieve from Domino Assistance ( Domino Directories ) , this kind of info ? </p><p>PS: Im cleaning the code( not your code, my added code) of the name picker, its almost 100% in firefox 1.5.x </p><p></p>
item.content:encoded:
hey Matt,

why i cant access other server´s names.nsf? why only the server the APP is running?

Im asking that , cause sometimes we do search others server´s names.nsf in NAB, you choose the server you want to search for… from a combo or whatever..

Do you have any reference on Domino Assistance+AJAX?
how could i proceed to make it possible?

how to retrieve from Domino Assistance ( Domino Directories ) , this kind of info ?

PS: Im cleaning the code( not your code, my added code) of the name picker, its almost 100% in firefox 1.5.x

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Fernando,</p><p>The code was written for an IE only site, however my brief testing in Firefox didn't reveal any major problems.</p><p>I like that you guys are spending the time to extend my code. When you're done please let me know and I'll publish an update article giving you all the credit of course!</p><p>Wish I had the time to help but things are very busy at the moment.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Fernando,

The code was written for an IE only site, however my brief testing in Firefox didn’t reveal any major problems.

I like that you guys are spending the time to extend my code. When you’re done please let me know and I’ll publish an update article giving you all the credit of course!

Wish I had the time to help but things are very busy at the moment.

Matt
